title: Marc Watson: Realms调整了view distance
author: lichi2050
txt_content:
Marc Watson: As requested, and after doing some secret testing this month, we've officially updated the view distance in Realms to 10.Marc Watson: 按照请求, 以及我们这个月做了一些秘密测试（**交易？）, 我们正式更新Realms的 view distance（可视距离） 至10.
ps：看来为了保持Realms的流畅度也只能这样了

replies.author: MY200378
replies.txt_content: 什么意思啊，是不是视距啊？？？

replies.author: Mccraft-pepsi
replies.txt_content: 好像又改进了一点点233[前排]
